cells.text: A Fenestron$^{®}$ is a unique tail rotor design which is actually a

cells.text: A NOTAR$^{®}$ antitorque system has no visible rotor mounted

cells.text: is located inside the tail boom. NOTAR$^{®}$ is an acronym
